amendment.description: To restore funding for certain programs under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1612 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1612 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324) To restore funding for certain programs under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1612 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1612 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 1542.
